```{r}
library(osmdata)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
```

https://emmavestesson.netlify.com/2018/02/what-should-i-have-for-lunch/

```{r }
# get coffee shops in Peterborough centre
q0 <- opq(bbox = c(-0.2516654311,52.5702242398,-0.2349069891,52.5767054999))
res0 <- osmdata_sf(q0)

cafe <- add_osm_feature(opq = q0, key = "amenity", value = "cafe") %>% 
  osmdata_sf()
cafe <- cafe$osm_points
cafe <- st_transform(cafe, crs = 4326)
cafe <- cafe %>% 
  select(osm_id, name)
```
